programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep33
programme.desc: To Heather Or Not To Heather - When Heather and Windshear land on Dragon's Edge to join the Dragon Rider crew, they quickly discover that Windshear doesn't play well with others.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep25
programme.desc: Twig Tat / The Gnome - After getting advice from the Yard Tree, Twig gets a carve (like a tattoo) but he gets more and more carves and ends up going too far. / Upon finding a giant, offensive garden gnome, TMOs debate whether to destroy it or consider it art.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep33
programme.desc: Copy Cat - When Puss accidentally agrees to ride for both Artephius and the orphans in the annual San Lorenzo horse race, his twin Puss Dos enters the race.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep116
programme.desc: Hide And Squeak - The twins are playing hide and seek with Pip but they all argue over who is the best at hiding? Can they make up their differences and play nicely together?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep117
programme.desc: Twinkle Twinkle - Buttercup and Daisy find some stars in flowertot garden. They think they have fallen out of the sky and try to return them.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep53
programme.desc: Compost Chaos - Primrose can't make her garden grow and turns to Fifi for advice. She is amazed when Fifi points out that you need to water and weed a garden. And surely she can't really mean putting that yucky compost everywhere can she?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep54
programme.desc: Bumble's Afraid Of The Dark - Primrose and Violet are having a sleepover. When Bumble admits that he is scared of the dark, the tots try everything to stop him from being afraid

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep25
programme.desc: What's The Grumbly Rumbly Noise? - Jess sets out to re-assure his frightened friends by working out what the noise is in the sky that's so loud.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep26
programme.desc: When Will The Snow Come? - Jess is hoping that soon it will snow so that they can make snow kittens and play in the snow like they did last year. First though he has to work out what the weather would have to be like for the snow to come..

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep27
programme.desc: What Do We Need To Grow Beans? - Jess and the friends want to grow something for their kind friend Mimi who's always growing special things for them. They start with a bean and work out how important sunlight and water are too, by trial and error.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep28
programme.desc: Why Is Hedgehog Curled Up? - Jess is very worried about Hedgehog. He keeps curling up into a ball and Jess thinks he must need help and wants to find out how he can make his little friend feel better. Jess thinks he may need help building a little house, or that he's cold or needs a drink. But it's only when his farmyard buddies who are busy playing 'Scarey Steps' come and shout 'Scarey!' that Jess realises little HH curles up when he's frightened. Jess says goodbye and asks the children to see if they can spot a hedgehog out and about, but of course, remember to be gentle.

programme.title: Olivia Ep29
programme.desc: Olivia's Day At The Office - When Father takes Olivia and Ian to bring your kids to work day, Olivia is looking forward to a fun day with dad at the office. But when Father is given a new deadline for a big project, Olivia hatches a plan to help him out. First, however they have to track down Ian's missing frog.

programme.title: Olivia Ep30
programme.desc: Olivia Helps Mother Nature - After learning about the environment, Olivia is on a mission to recycle, cut down on waste, and conserve energy. But she just can't get Ian to turn off his light at night. Either she'll have to find a way for Ian to fall asleep without it, or else find a sustainable alternative

programme.title: Olivia Ep31
programme.desc: Olivia Becomes A Vet - After a trip to the vet with Julian's pet lizard Bernie, Olivia is inspired to become a vet herself. She imagines herself curing all kinds of wild animals, and back home she goes to work on the only two patients available: her pets! Her treatments for Edwin and Perry turn out to be a bit messier than she expected.

programme.title: Olivia Ep32
programme.desc: Olivia Becomes A Chef - It's Mother's birthday, and Olivia's planning something really special: a surprise dinner, with all red food. Imagining she's a famous chef with Dad and Ian as her helpers, the real challenge is keeping mum out of the kitchen while they prepare her special meal.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep25
programme.desc: Why Flamingo Stands On One Leg - You see there was a time when Flamingo stood on both legs. One morning, Flamingo and her flock landed at the Water Hole when all the crabs were busy performing their underwater dance. Needless to say, all these legs where in their way! Tortoise came up with the plan that if all Crabs each nipped a flamingo leg, there will be room to share the waterhole. So from then on, Flamingo stood on one legs and Crabs were able to perform their dance in the watering hole

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep26
programme.desc: Why Woodpecker Pecks - You see there was a time when Woodpecker didn't peck. All the birds had their very own sound, but Woodpecker didn't make a sound at all. Then one very dark night in Tinga Tinga, the Moon and the Stars disappear! The animals summon the birds to tell Lion but Woodpecker can't pass the message on! Distraught, Woodpecker flies up to the skies but where are the stars?! And where is the Moon?! In desperation Woodpecker pecks at the dark sky and a star comes back, then another, then another! Everyone is delighted, no beast more than Woodpecker who now has her very own special sound pecking.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep27
programme.desc: Why Ostrich Sticks Her Head In The Ground - You see there was a time when Ostrich was all covered in feathers and unlike all the other birds, Ostrich wasn't very good at flying at all. One night in Tinga Tinga Spider decided to make Jackal a pair of wings so that he could fly up to the moon and stop howling! Jackal and Spider stole the feathers from Ostrich's neck and legs until she looked like a very big plucked chicken! The next day Ostrich was mortified and stuck her head in the ground so that Lion couldn't see her. And it was perfect because Ostrich looked just like a bush! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep28
programme.desc: Why Camel Has A Hump - You see there was time when Camel didn't have a hump. He lived very far away in the hot desert. But one day the desert got too hot even for Camel. So he started walking. When Camel arrived at the Waterhole he asked the animals if he good have a drink. All the animals weren't pleased at all because the rains hadn't come and they were very thirsty. Lion allowed Camel to have one drink but ONE drink, and ONE DRINK ONLY! Camel slurped, and he slurped, and he slurped! Until POP!' a big, wobbly hump appeared on his back full of all the animals' water! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep9
programme.desc: Dog the Right Thing - In preparation for the big race to determine the next Race Cadets, Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to build their own cars. The catch? The car parts are scattered throughout Pawston. \ The Not Yet Cadets compete in the final race to see which team will join the Race Cadets.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep9
programme.desc: Lost and Found / In the Park In the Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep17
programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep18
programme.desc: Night of the Frodarg - On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep61
programme.desc: The Wings Of War Part 2 - When Stoick decides to take the battle on the Dragon Flyers to the Edge, the Riders must figure out how to trap the Flyers and take back the Edge

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia Ep17
programme.desc: Blinky's Day Out - After the events at Gattos Keep Blinky is transformed into a human being and Jim discovers the assassin that is hunting him.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia Ep18
programme.desc: The Shattered King - While Jim and Toby search for dates to the Spring Dance the team searches for the Second Triumbric Stone in the marshlands of the Quagawumps.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep1
programme.desc: The New Alliance - A space explorer, previously thought lost in space, returns to Earth and joins four teenagers in a search for a giant alien robot lion

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep2
programme.desc: From Days Long Ago - The Blue Lion delivers the team to an alien planet where they discover a mysterious castle. Inside, they awaken an alien princess who sends them on a mission to find the remaining lions.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep3
programme.desc: Defenders Of The Universe - The Castle is attacked by an alien battle cruiser. The new Paladins must form Voltron for the first time in 10,000 years.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep4
programme.desc: Some Assembly Required - Princess Allura puts the Paladins through a rigorous training program in hopes of putting aside their differences and working together as a team.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep5
programme.desc: Return Of The Gladiator - A Voltron-Sized Robot Beast attacks Planet Arus. While Voltron defends the innocent inhabitants, Shiro searches for answers about his lost time as a Galra captive.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep70
programme.desc: Squad Goals - When King Juliens consultant tells him that his squad is losing their cool King Julien decides to get a whole new crew

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep19
programme.desc: Xerx Works - On a mission to destroy the factory that manufactures Octavians Xerx warriors, Cleo and Pharaoh Yosira butt heads over whos in charge and Mihos masquerades as a cabbage.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep20
programme.desc: Parasites - Mihos has some parasites making him sick, and Cleo and the rest have to shrink down tiny to cure him. This one turns out weirder than youre expecting.

programme.desc: Grandpa's Treasures - In the wake of her grandfather's death, Lucky sets out to show the town his softer side and give him the goodbye he deserves.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep73
programme.desc: There Will Be Mud - Big Oil is bringing big improvements to the school. But new track stables, an upgraded veterinary lab and dorm rooms come at a cost and spark disaster.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep10
programme.desc: Night Of The Living Croods / Spoonful Of Soo-Gar - When The Croods experience the first-ever sugar-rush, they're hooked on the delicious new food; Grug is labeled a zombie after taking the first nap.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep67
programme.desc: No Bark, All Bite - Hiccup and Stoick set forth to find willow bark while Gobber holds a cookoff for the merchants until things go a riot and the riders have to protect Berk

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep29
programme.desc: The Night Pig / Twigula - Kensington is terrorized by her overactive imagination when a possum comes into the yard and tangles with the Mighty Ones. / Berry mistakenly thinks that Twig is a juice sucker (like vampires for berries) and tries to convince him to make her into one too.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep34
programme.desc: Coin Toss - Dulcinea must save the town from thieves when Puss and the townspeople become obsessed with a gambling game and forget to protect San Lorenzo.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep10

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep55
programme.desc: Count On Fifi - Fifi and Bumble deliver lots of delicious honey to Poppy's stall. They lose a pot on the way and there isn't enough to go round. Can they find the missing pot, or will Stingo have to go without his honey for tea?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep56
programme.desc: Poppy The Line Dancing Queen - Poppy is having a line dancing party, but none of the other flowertots know how to do it. Will any of them learn to dance in time or will Poppy have to cancel the party?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep57
programme.desc: King Stingo - Aunt Tulip has lost Grubby again. When Stingo finds him, he asks to be made King as a reward. It isn't long before he has gone too far and the tots are all fed up with his demands. Can Fifi get life in the garden back to normal?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep58
programme.desc: Hide And Seek - The tots are playing hide and seek and the winner will get Fifi's delicious jam tarts. Who will win, Stingo and Slugsy are sure it will be them!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep29
programme.desc: How Can We Make The Most Beautiful Garden Ever? - Poor Mimi! Her normally beautiful garden is all messy and full of swirly piles of earth. She's really upset and Jess promises to her help her make it the most beautiful garden ever! Raking away the swirls doesn't work, they just come back! Jess and Mimi realise that worms are making the swirly piles of earth. Mimi wants to move them away but they go back underground before she can catch them. When it rains the worms come back and Jess and Mimi gather up the worms in a bucket and take them to live in the orchard by a patch of scrappy flowers. The garden still isn't looking at it's best though! After the worms have gone Mimi's flowers go all droopy. Willow explains that worms make help make the soil rich and good for plants and that's what makes the flowers bloom. Jess remembers that the worms had come out when it rained. They water the ground to bring the worms up to the surface again. The worms agree to come back to Mimi's garden and soon her garden is beautiful again. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep30
programme.desc: Why Are There Little Hills In The Orchard? - Jess and the pups have been looking after the orchard while Willow's been on holiday but the day she's due back the orchard is full of little piles of earth. What's making them? That's the Big Question. Jess wonders if someone put them there. He asks Mimi, who's making a pile of earth while she digs a hole. She tells him she's going to plant an apple tree. Maybe someone's been planting new apple trees in the orchard thinks Jess. But when he looks carefully there are no holes or newly planted trees. Horace the hoppy frog suggests that maybe it's an invisible digger who's digging underground. Billie the little mouse arrives and tells Jess that the little piles of earth are called molehills. Jess works out that the piles of earth are in a line. Maybe someone is digging a tunnel underground so they can travel right across the orchard. They keep very quiet and a tiny mole pops out above ground. That's who's been making piles of earth in the orchard. They've answered the question. Hooray!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep31
programme.desc: Why Are There So Many Ladybirds? - One winter morning Jess finds lots of ladybird in his barn. Why are they there? That's the Big Question! Mimi tells him that she has lots of ladybirds in her garden in the summer. They're always hungry and brilliant for the plants because they eat all the greenfly. Maybe they're looking for greenfly in his barn? Jess doesn't think so. There are no greenfly in the barn. He goes to ask Baa and Billie for help. They're saying goodbye to Little Bird who's flying away to a warmer country for the winter. Jess thinks maybe the ladybirds are gathering to fly away too and rushes back to his barn to say goodbye. But when he gets there he finds that the ladybirds are now all huddled together and fast asleep. What's going on? Jess goes to ask Willow and finds a hedgehog sleeping under some leaves near the stable. Willow explains that some animals find it hard to find food in the winter, especially if they can't store it, so they eat as much as they can and then go to sleep during the winter. It's called hibe

programme.desc: Video Game Heroes - Blaze and AJ are super excited to play their new video game. But when a video game wizard makes the game come alive, Blaze and AJ must level up and save Axle City from pixel pandemonium

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep517
programme.desc: The Blaze Family - Blaze and AJ are spending the day with some very special trucks: Blaze's family! His Mom, Dad, and little sister Sparkle join Blaze in a race against Crusher to prove they're the world's fastest family!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Pups Save the Jungle Penguins / Pups Save a Freighter - An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home. // Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Pups Save the Honey / Pups Save Mayor Goodway's Purse - Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it - and her beehive - go missing from her farm! // Mayor Goodway's purse has disappeared! Along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin - Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Paddington Makes a Scrapbook / Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru - Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy. // Paddington decides to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's green house.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep145
programme.desc: Daddy Puts Up a Picture - Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He accidentally cracks the wall while doing it, so Peppa and George help Daddy Pig fix the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep146
programme.desc: At the Beach - Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there including burying Daddy Pig in the sand. When it's time to go they almost leave without Daddy Pig as he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep147
programme.desc: Mister Skinnylegs - George finds a spider in the bathroom sink, but Peppa is really frightened-until she realizes that it doesn't want to hurt her.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep148
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Boat - Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Something Fishy Going On! - Police Officers Molly and Gil are tracking some mysterious lights (aliens!?) that have been popping up around town. With the help of several nocturnal animal friends, they discover the lights aren't aliens at all, they are anglerfish!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Magenta's Thank You Day Surprise - It's Thank You Day and our friends Miranda and Magenta are coming over to celebrate! When Magenta's picture of what she's thankful for gets ruined, we play a special game of Magenta's Clues to figure out what she's thankful for!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep306
programme.desc: A Blue's Clues Festival of Lights - Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah, the festival of lights! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special, surprise guest coming to our Hanukkah party, and we'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Nacho Supreme / Sea Cow - Toms's new pet friend, Nacho, shows off his special skills when the crew goes on a daring rescue mission to save Kiko. // The crew must stop Bonnie Bones' latest quest for treasure when she disrupts a manatee habitat with a sticky invention.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Honey Bear - When Bossy's cousin Honey Bear comes to visit, he struggles to be a a good friend.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Science Pair - Bossy and Turtle try to make the coolest science fair project so they can become hall monitors.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Cart-tastrophe - Bossy schemes to get Turtle new Boom Boom Super Satang cards.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep808
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers - Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar / Pups Save the Yoga Goats - Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert! // Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing! It's up to the Paw Patrol to find the goats and return them to Yumi's farm.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep100
programme.desc: Lights Out - When the lights go out in Home Dome, the Teletubbies get the giggles! The lights come back on again and there's Tubby Custard mess everywhere.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Rocket - Dee encourages a friend to say 'rocket' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We have lots of fun with rockets - a blast off rocket, a flying rocket and a zooming to the moon rocket!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Piled-Up Play - When Jo's game of Target Ball overruns and the Blockers shut down the playing field, Team Tinpo come up with a sweet solution so three games can be played at the same time.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep31
programme.desc: It's time for a birthday party - When JoJo learns that Jared was too busy to have a birthday party, Gran Gran has a Gran Gran Plan to throw Jared a surprise belated birthday party!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Fix It Mum and Dad - Monty believes that parents can fix everything, until he is told by his parents that they cannot fix his toy helicopter.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Fun Factory - Monty ponders why fun activities must end, when he and Jimmy Jones are told by Stan their time playing at the park for the day is finished.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Fairies - Bluey's house has fairies! Tails are being braided, stickers are everywhere, and Mum's got a peg beard. Now the family must band together to hunt for these invisible mischief-makers.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Norrie's First Day - Norrie skips into the Clubhouse and greets her friends. As they greet her, they reminisce about when they first met.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep52
programme.desc: The Walking Badge - The Squirrels learn the many ways you can walk with the help of friends and a catchy song.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep51
programme.desc: The Action Hero Badge - The Squirrels learn about an action hero called Jet Rocket who always saves the day by smashing and crashing things. But there are other ways to save the day!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep24
programme.desc: Chinese New Year, Dragon Dance Drama - Kyan's invited to perform a dragon dance for Chinese New Year in Beijing. Glitch decides to build a fire breathing dragon robot for the parade and The Go Jetters need to stop it!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep23
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Whale Rescue - After a pod of pilot whales becomes stranded at the Academy beach, the Go Jetters, with help from new teacher Professor Wave, must work fast to return them to the ocean deeps.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep29
programme.desc: The Creek - Bored of the local playground, Dad and the kids go out bushwalking on a journey to their local creek. Cast out of her comfort zone, Bluey's eyes are opened to the beauty of the natural world.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Grannies - A game of 'grannies' is fun, until Bluey and Bingo can't agree on one simple question: Can Grannies dance? Now they need to video call Nana to get the answer.

programme.desc: River Chub - Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to North America in search of a river chub that builds an underwater nest with over 7000 pebbles.

programme.desc: Prawns - Chantelle and friends look for prawns in the rock pools, whilst Rory heads to the harbour.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC275TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: Whose titles were on the line at UFC 275 as Glover Teixeira faced Jiri Prochazka and Valentina Shevchenko took on Taila Santos. Plus, Joanna Jedrzejczyk returned to face Zhang Weili in an epic rematch. See the main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep903VolkanovskivsOrtega
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC and reigning featherweight champion, Alexander Volkanovski defends his title against Jiu-Jitsu savant, Brian T-City Ortega at UFC 266. See both men train and prepare to fight for the UFCs 145-pound title.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC276AdesanyavsCannonieris
programme.desc: It was a night for Aussies at UFC 276 as Israel Adesanya defended his title against Jared Cannonier and Alexander Volkanovski faced Max Holloway for the third time. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep7
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep30
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep6
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep403UsmanvsBurns
programme.desc: In 2021, UFC Welterweight Champion Kamaru Usman took on former teammate and friend Gilbert Burns. Get an in-depth look at both athletes journeys to the Octagon and relive Usmans performance as he cements his place in UFC history.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2321
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Motul TT Assen Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The MotoGP World Championship crowns one of 22 riders lining up on 1000cc prototype bikes capable of producing over 240 horsepower and getting up to speeds of 350kph over 21 Grand Prix races.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2321
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 291: Poirier vs. Gaethje 2
programme.desc: Prelims - The BMF title is up for grabs in the main event of UFC 291 on July 29, as Dustin Poirier and Justin Gaethje meet in a highly anticipated rematch at Delta Center in Utah where fireworks are not just expected, but mandatory when two of the best 155-pounders of this era collide. Plus, former champions meet when Alex Pereira makes his light heavyweight debut in a compelling matchup against the owner of Polish Power, Jan Blachowicz

programme.title: UFC 291: Poirier vs. Gaethje 2
programme.desc: Main Event - The BMF title is up for grabs in the main event of UFC 291 on July 29, as Dustin Poirier and Justin Gaethje meet in a highly anticipated rematch at Delta Center in Utah where fireworks are not just expected, but mandatory when two of the best 155-pounders of this era collide. Plus, former champions meet when Alex Pereira makes his light heavyweight debut in a compelling matchup against the owner of Polish Power, Jan Blachowicz

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Champs Only - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: UFC The Walk EpUFC257PoiriervsMcGregor2
programme.desc: UFC The Walk gives fight fans a retrospective look back at some of the most iconic moments in combat sports history. Re-live the experience of UFC champions and challengers as they prepare for their biggest fights, and get an in-depth look at their performances inside the Octagon.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Aspinall vs. Tybura
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC is back in London on July 22 for another action-packed event at The O2 Arena, and in the main event, its the highly anticipated return of Englands own Tom Aspinall, as he takes on Polish powerhouse Marcin Tybura in the five-rounder that closes UFC on ESPN. After winning his first five UFC bouts, all by knockout or submission, Aspinals meteoric rise up the heavyweight ladder was momentarily halted by an injury in July of 2022. But this summer, Aspinall is back and eager to make up for lost time against Tybura, who is coming off back-to-back wins over Alexandr Romanov and Blagoy Ivanov

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs Font
programme.desc: Prelims - A bantamweight bout between former interim UFC Bantamweight Championship challenger Cory Sandhagen and Umar Nurmagomedov was expected to headline the event. However, Nurmagomedov withdrew from the event in mid-July due to a shoulder injury. He was replaced by Rob Font in a catchweight bout of 140 pounds. The Ultimate Fighter: Team Joanna vs. Team Cludia women's strawweight winner Tatiana Suarez and Virna Jandiroba were scheduled to meet in a women's strawweight bout. However on June 20, it was announced that Jandiroba pulled out due to a knee injury and was replaced by former UFC Women's Strawweight Champion Jssica Andrade.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs Font
programme.desc: Main Event - A bantamweight bout between former interim UFC Bantamweight Championship challenger Cory Sandhagen and Umar Nurmagomedov was expected to headline the event. However, Nurmagomedov withdrew from the event in mid-July due to a shoulder injury. He was replaced by Rob Font in a catchweight bout of 140 pounds. The Ultimate Fighter: Team Joanna vs. Team Cludia women's strawweight winner Tatiana Suarez and Virna Jandiroba were scheduled to meet in a women's strawweight bout. However on June 20, it was announced that Jandiroba pulled out due to a knee injury and was replaced by former UFC Women's Strawweight Champion Jssica Andrade.
